Macros | Typedefs | Enumerations
LPC13xx Devices
Architectures
Collaboration diagram for LPC13xx Devices:

Detailed Description

This contains the device specific definitions for the LPC13xx microcontroller series.

The following devices are supported:

  • lpc1342
  • lpc1343

GPIO Configurations used with pin_assign member of the *_attr_t data structures:

  • TBD

Macros

#define ADC_MAX
 The maximum ADC value on the LPC13xx.
 
#define ADC_MIN
 The minimum ADC step value on the LPC13xx.
 
#define ADC_MAX_FREQ
 The maximum ADC sampling frequency.
 
#define FLASH_MIN_WRITE_SIZE
 The minimum flash write size.
 
#define FLASH_MAX_WRITE_SIZE
 The maximum flash write size.
 

Typedefs

typedef void * hwpl_target_ptr_t
 A pointer on the lpc13xx.
 
typedef uint16_t adc_sample_t
 ADC Sample type (when reading ADC)
 
typedef uint32_t gpio_sample_t
 This defines the type of a GPIO sample for reading/writing the GPIO (see gpio_read() and gpio_write()). More...
 
typedef uint32_t pwm_duty_t
 This defines the type for the PWM duty cycle for reading/writing the PWM.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum lpc13xx_tmr_action_channel_t

This lists the timer action channels.

Enumerator
TMR_ACTION_CHANNEL_OC0 

Output compare channel 0

TMR_ACTION_CHANNEL_OC1 

Output compare channel 1

TMR_ACTION_CHANNEL_OC2 

Output compare channel 2

TMR_ACTION_CHANNEL_OC3 

Output compare channel 3

TMR_ACTION_CHANNEL_IC0 

Input capture channel 0
